sources.title: Nabonga (1944)
sources.description: When a treasure hunter seeks a downed airplane in the jungles of Africa, he encounters one of the passenger's young daughter, now fully grown, and with a gorilla protector. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/nabonga-1944/

sources.title: Nabonga
sources.description: Fairly standard "white heiress who was lost in the jungle as an infant, but turns out to be a goddess to local tribe of natives" adventure. The white goddess in this case is the highly decorative Julie London, she's found by Buster Crabbe, and maintains her power via her control of an ape(suit), Nabonga. There is a bit of a twist on the standard story - instead of needing to find her to secure her fortune, her father was the crook, and Crabbe is looking to return some of the loot that he stole. Mostly lackluster. The MP4 and the Matroska (MKV) files were derived from the MPEG2 file found here . The Matroska is a Theora file with Vorbis sound, but Handbrake wouldn't let me put it in an OGG container for some reason.

sources.title: Nabonga (1944) JUNGLE ADVENTURE

Stars: Buster Crabbe, Julie London, Barton MacLane 
 Director: Sam Newfield

 When a treasure hunter seeks a downed airplane in the jungles of Africa, he encounters one of the passenger's young daughter, now fully grown, and with a gorilla protector.

sources.title: DOUBLE FEATURE HELL 4 (jungle jills)
sources.description: The 2am Theater shamefully presents another insomniac double feature. This time it's all about the ladies (and some guys in gorilla suits). The sweaty safari begins with coming attractions and a cartoon, followed by the first feature, "Nabonga," with Julie London. The intermission featurette is chapter 2 of the serial "Perils of the Darkest Jungle" (a.k.a. "The Tiger Woman") with Linda Sterling. The second feature presentation is "Blonde Savage" with Gale Sherwood and Veda Ann Borg. NOTE: The complete serial "Perils of the Darkest Jungle," which is highly recommended for matinee serial fans, is available on DVD from the Roan Group. All the other items in this simulation are found in various IA collections.

metadata.Plot: In an effort to clear the name of his deceased father, young Ray Gorman travels to darkest Africa to try to track down the money embezzled from his father's bank years earlier. After a long trek through the jungle Gorman finds the money in the care of beautiful 'white witch' Doreen, daughter of the now long-dead embezzler. Gorman finds his goal difficult to accomplish as not only does Doreen, guarded by a huge, ferocious gorilla, not want to give up the money, but greedy guide Carl Hurst has followed Gorman's trail, intent on getting the money himself by any means necessary.
metadata.Actors: Buster Crabbe, Fifi D'Orsay, Barton MacLane
